name: WeniCX
0:
”Alexa, open office depot”
”Office depot, where is my order?”
”Alexa, open office depot and see the status of my order”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: office depot
des: This skill is focused on presenting the best CX opportunities using the VTEX system. These opportunities would be: Order cancellation, Order status, expected delivery date, FAQ about store information, payment information, order information. In the FAQ process, Agent Builder is used, an artificial intelligence developed by Weni by VTEX that focuses on answering questions. All of this based on a single base of your client's content.
